tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sensor_value NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Outliers ( 
  outlier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  sensor_id INT, 
  outlier_value FLOAT, 
  outlier_reason TEXT, 
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SensorData(sensor_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    anomaly_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE outliers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    outlier_type VARCHAR(50),
    outlier_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE outlier_data(
    outlier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    outlier_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reason VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_data(
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    anomaly_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    deviation_percentage FLOAT
);
